pull.title: Add Andreas Schildbach to gitian download scripts.

events.body: Ping! What's needed/missing to get this merged?
Nothing missing IMO, but I am waiting for someone else from the core devs to comment on the weight issue (I think michagogo 1 versus the rest 40 makes no sense).
This isn't actually used in any way right now. Maybe we want to postpone the weights discussion until an actual downloader is ready and being deployed?
So can you just tell me what the weight should be for now?
I don't care. It has no meaning.
If we want to postpone the discussion, I'd vote for removing the weights. This is bound to come back every time otherwise.

Or set them all to 11? :-P

On Saturday, March 29, 2014, Wladimir J. van der Laan <
notifications@github.com> wrote:

> If we want to postpone the discussion, I'd vote for removing the weights.
> 
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHubhttps://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/3907#issuecomment-39001653
> .

events.message: Add Andreas Schildbach to gitian download scripts.
Remove weights from download config for now as it's unclear how it will be used in future.

events.body: I put a commit on top that removes all weights from the download config. Now you can pick merging either only the first commit or merging both.

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/2a9edeb1c8447397dc9b05843e179379ad922dfc for binaries and test log.
This test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/current/
Contact BlueMatt on freenode if something looks broken.

Okay, at this point I have a question. What is the point of contrib/gitian-downloader existing with the configs at all if we're not using them? I'm assuming that @aschildbach's latest change makes the file's syntax or w/e invalid. What's the point of keeping it at all?

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -43,4 +43,8 @@ signers:
     weight: 1
     name: michagogo
     key: michagogo
+  E944AE667CF960B1004BC32FCA662BE18B877A60:
+    weight: 40
comments.body: What should this weight be? Why michagogo only has 1?

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -43,4 +43,8 @@ signers:
     weight: 1
     name: michagogo
     key: michagogo
+  E944AE667CF960B1004BC32FCA662BE18B877A60:
+    weight: 40
comments.body:
I asked on the mailing list and they said weight is added up until minimum_weight reached (which means the download is verified).
As for the michagogo question, I don't know.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -43,4 +43,8 @@ signers:
     weight: 1
     name: michagogo
     key: michagogo
+  E944AE667CF960B1004BC32FCA662BE18B877A60:
+    weight: 40
comments.body: The relevant PR is https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/3023, most of the discussion re: weight can be found in the IRC logs, if you want to go back and find it.
